title: Biden vs Late Stage Capitalism, Black Mirror Bezos 06.03.22

description:
In episode 1261, Jack and Miles are joined by actor, writer, and producer Behzad Dabu to discuss… wHy dOeSn’T aNyOnE LiKe BiDen?, Speaking of capitalist dystopias…Amazon workers surveilled CONSTANTLY and more!

  1. wHy dOeSn’T aNyOnE LiKe BiDen?
  2. Inside a Biden White House adrift
  3. Speaking of capitalist dystopias…Amazon workers surveilled CONSTANTLY

LISTEN: Let Me In Your Life by Asha Puthli
